version_description:
Fixed bug: Music stops during workout

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

Fixed bug: Music stops during workout

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

• POSSIBILITY TO BUY NEW WORKOUTS
- FAT BURN ACCELERATOR, to burn even more calories!
- EXPLOSIVE BUTT, for perfect glutes in just 7 minutes a day!

• UNLOCKED THE ACHIEVEMENT SYSTEM
You can now complete 100% of the goals for each workout in order to be even more motivated!

• DO MORE CONSECUTIVE TRAINING CYCLES
At the end of each cycle you can start again without leaving your workout in order to burn even more calories and unlock all goals!

• ADDED EXERCISE LIBRARY
A new section where you can see all the exercises found in the trainings.

• NEW APP FOR APPLE WATCH
An App completely redesigned in order to offer a better experience that will allow you to control your workout straight from your Apple Watch.

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

• All users who have removed ads or purchased an individual workout will receive the full, unlocked App as a loyalty reward!

- 修复了小漏洞

像往常一样，我们请求您在留下任何负面评论前，将任何漏洞情况通过发送电子邮件至support@passion4profession.net向我们报告。我们会尽力为您提供最佳产品，因为锻炼应该是一件令人愉悦的事情;-)

P4P 团队
